title: BOOK BOLT 2.0 AMAZON RESEARCH TOOLS AND STUDIO FULL TUTORIAL

tactics.name: Product Search Analysis
tactics.description: Identify best-selling low-content books using competition categories, bestseller ranks, and performance metrics.
steps: Enter keywords or select a category
Sort by bestselling ranks (lower is better)
caveats: Requires ASIN for detailed competitor metrics
source_quotes: 'Product search displays top selling lowcontent books by analyzing competition categories, bestseller ranks, and performance.'

tactics.name: Keyword Optimization
tactics.description: Use competitor ASINs to uncover SIN keywords and search volume data for keyword optimization.
steps: Analyze search volume and competition metrics
source_quotes: 'Book Scout reveals competitor SIN keywords plus metrics like search volume and competition for smarter keyword optimization.'

tactics.name: Keyword Categorization
tactics.description: Organize keywords into categories to streamline metadata optimization for KDP uploads
caveats: Categories may become cluttered without regular maintenance
source_quotes: You can add some of these keywords as favorites... add it to your favorites section

tactics.name: Keyword Search Analysis
tactics.description: Evaluate Amazon keyword performance using search volume and competition metrics
steps: Use product search to analyze competitors
caveats: Requires precise keyword targeting for accurate results
source_quotes: The more specific and niche your keywords are, the better your search results will be

tactics.name: sales_trend_analysis
tactics.description: Analyze sales trends and price changes using Book Scout and BSR reports
steps: Check sales rank and price history via line graphs
Use Book Scout for keyword insights
caveats: Price spikes may indicate temporary promotions
source_quotes: You can click on this first icon to jump to Book Scout and that would show you the keywords

tactics.name: kdp_spy_analysis
tactics.description: Use KDP Spy extension to analyze book stats for competitive insights
steps: Review metrics like price, sales, revenue
source_quotes: You can always change the keyword and try again. You can also click on the top of the column to sort.

heuristics.name: High-Volume Keyword Boost
heuristics.condition: If search volume exceeds 1000, prioritize keyword
source_quotes: 'Explore the top KDP niches and bestselling products.'

heuristics.name: Seasonal Trend Monitoring
heuristics.condition: If current date is near holiday, prioritize Halloween-themed products
source_quotes: This particular book had a really high sales rank and it dipped down mostly because it's just about Halloween

heuristics.name: category_optimization
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize category relevance
source_quotes: Using the best categories for your book will improve your book's searchability

heuristics.name: revenue_sorting
heuristics.condition: If sorting by revenue reveals high-performing books
source_quotes: I can click on the top of that column to sort by revenue.

claims.statement: Bookbolt 2.0 provides real Amazon keyword search volume data for KDP research.
source_quotes: 'Book Bolt makes it easy to uncover high demand, low competition book ideas using these tools.'

claims.statement: Evergreen products maintain consistent sales performance across seasons
source_quotes: The evergreens option finds timeless products that never go out of style

claims.statement: KDP categories influence search visibility and discoverability
source_quotes: Using the best categories for your book will improve your book's searchability

claims.statement: KDP Spy provides behind-the-scenes book metrics for Amazon research
source_quotes: KDP Spy is a valuable browser extension tool that allows you to see book stats behind the scenes

niche_patterns.description: Target specific demographics with niche constraints for low-competition markets.
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines identity (target audience), problem (ADHD), and constraint (Christian values) for focused content.
source_quotes: 'Explore the top KDP niches and bestselling products.'

niche_patterns.example: coloring books + end of October + Halloween
niche_patterns.description: Leverage seasonal timing to capitalize on temporary demand spikes
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Aligns with platform algorithms prioritizing timely, context-aware content
source_quotes: It's the end of October... calendars for the new year are popular
